mapper.sql: UDF_OTL_DTC_ID, CRE_COMP_ID, CND_CONTS, ANA_DASE_ID, SRC_ANA_DASE_ID, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_USER_ID, WRIT_DTM
mapper.select: SELECT A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , A.CRE_COMP_ID , A.CND_CONTS , A.ANA_DASE_ID , A.SRC_ANA_DASE_ID , C.ANA_DASE_NM AS SRC_ANA_DASE_NM , B.ANA_DASE_NM FROM WAD_UODC_DASE_CND_DV A LEFT JOIN WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE B ON B.ANA_DASE_ID = A.ANA_DASE_ID LEFT JOIN WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE C ON C.ANA_DASE_ID = A.SRC_ANA_DASE_ID WHERE A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into WAD_UODC_DASE_CND_DV (UDF_OTL_DTC_ID, CRE_COMP_ID, CND_CONTS, ANA_DASE_ID, SRC_ANA_DASE_ID, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_USER_ID, WRIT_DTM) values (#{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cndConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{anaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcAnaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into WAD_UODC_DASE_CND_DV
UDF_OTL_DTC_ID,
CRE_COMP_ID,
CND_CONTS,
ANA_DASE_ID,
SRC_ANA_DASE_ID,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_USER_ID, WRIT_DTM
#{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cndConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{anaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{srcAnaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
1, 'C', #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now()
mapper.update:
update WAD_UODC_DASE_CND_DV
CND_CONTS = #{cndConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANA_DASE_ID = #{anaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_ANA_DASE_ID = #{srcAnaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_DTM = #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAD_UODC_DASE_CND_DV set CND_CONTS = #{cndConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANA_DASE_ID = #{anaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_ANA_DASE_ID = #{srcAnaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WRIT_DTM = #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
